data.name: My Girlfriend - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes the complete Soundtrack for the My Girlfriend version.

Including the main theme song with jpop singer, plus an instrumental version.
As well as the full 50 tracklist included in the game.

Track-list;
  • 1. My Girlfriend Theme Song
  • 2. My Girlfriend Theme Song Instrumental
  • 3. Main Theme 1
  • 4. Getting Playful
  • 5. Tender Moments
  • 6. Playful Moment
  • 7. The Weird Girl
  • 8. Sleepy Time
  • 9. When You're Down
  • 10. Come with me
  • 11. Day out with a Girl
  • 12. Lively Outdoors
  • 13. Mall Outing
  • 14. Alone Together
  • 15. Main Theme
  • 16. A Dreamlike Day
  • 17. Deep Thoughts
  • 18. Beating Heart
  • 19. The Calme
  • 20. SankakuKankei
  • 21. Calm Theme
  • 22. Meloncholic Encounter
  • 23. Weird Girl
  • 24. Touching
  • 25. Go Time
  • 26. Persistent Girl
  • 27. Happy End
  • 28. Upbeat
  • 29. Morning Run
  • 30. Divine Love
  • 31. Natural High
  • 32. Another Date
  • 33. Cheeky Girl
  • 34. Heaven
  • 35. Cheeky Girl
  • 36. Mysterious Night
  • 37. Sensual (on top)
  • 38. Challenge Time!
  • 39. Dream Away
  • 40. Upbeat, Sunny
  • 41. Evening Meal
  • 42. Happy Ending
  • 43. Slow Theme
  • 44. Happy Serene Quartet
  • 45. Nice Day
  • 46. Club Date
  • 47. Dream Girl
  • 48. Feeling at Home
  • 49. Secret
  • 50. Sad Theme
  • 51. Touch
  • 52. Come Here...

data.short_description: The complete music track for My Girlfriend, includes the original jpop theme song, instrumental version and the 50 songs that make up the music of My Girlfriend.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
